name: COMBO (Raycast Games)
description:
Welcome to COMBO, a small FPS where you are inside of a facility full of robots. Shoot your way through the waves and survive for as long as you can.

Credits:

  • Plazmin (Project Manager)
  • Hinkik (Music)
  • AmbientCG (Textures)
  • Taylor Huff (Weapons)
  • Unity Asset Store (Everything Else)
